title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, list, and delete models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI). Chat-like interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API, streaming support, POJO mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Generate, chat, pull and manage models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with readline history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community. Use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven recipes: FastAPI services, Next.js chat, RAG with Chroma, function calling, fine-tuning tips.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for Ollama. Cross-platform, tray icon, auto-updater, no browser needed.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift package for iOS/macOS apps. Async/Await wrappers around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, PVC, and autoscaling.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama. Zero-dependency TypeScript client, 100 kB unpacked.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package. Install via pip install ollama; supports Python 3.8+.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLMs to your server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance. Generate summaries, rewrite notes, or chat inside your vault.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain. One docker-compose up for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-function-calling
summary: Experimental repo demonstrating function/tool calling with Ollama models via structured prompts.
